original_text: And he was teaching daily in the temple. The chief priests and the scribes and the principal men of the people were seeking to destroy him,
korean_text: 예수께서 날마다 성전에서 가르치시니 대제사장들과 서기관들과 백성의 지도자들이 그를 죽이려고 꾀하되

sentences.original_text: And he was teaching daily in the temple.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 매일 성전에서 가르치고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The chief priests and the scribes
and the principal men of the people
